parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
As if, as it were, like; with numbers: about. From hos and ei; as if.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: To divide up into parts, break up; I distribute. From dia and merizo; to partition thoroughly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
